meanings.definition: The presence of amino acids in the urine.
meanings.sent1: Aminoaciduria can be detected through urine tests.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed the patient with aminoaciduria after analyzing the urine sample.
meanings.sent3: The party trickster joked that his aminoaciduria made his urine a valuable commodity.
meanings.sent4: Her aminoaciduria was like a colorful stream of secrets flowing out of her body.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering rainbow of aminoaciduria in the urine was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Excretion of amino acids in the urine.
meanings.sent1: The aminoaciduria indicated a problem with the body's metabolism.
meanings.sent2: Excessive aminoaciduria can lead to nutrient deficiencies.
meanings.sent3: The cat's aminoaciduria in the litter box puzzled the veterinarian.
meanings.sent4: The aminoaciduria flowed like a river of information leaving the body.
meanings.sent5: The golden hue of aminoaciduria in the urine hinted at underlying health issues.
